scripts.build: sed -i '' 's/dev = true/dev = false/g' index.js && electron-packager . NiuAuction --out dist/mac/ --overwrite --icon NiuWebAuction.icns --ignore="(dist|node_modules|web_src)"
scripts.build:win: sed -i '' 's/dev = true/dev = false/g' index.js && electron-packager . NiuAuction --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/win/ --overwrite --icon NiuWebAuction.ico --ignore="(dist|node_modules|web_src)"
